participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and sociable, enjoys collaboration and sharing hobbies with friends.
participant_1.background: I miss playing outside with my friends in the summer. I like Italian cuisine. I like the color blue. My favorite artist is Justin Bieber. I enjoy doing DIY projects in my free time, especially drywall work.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Passionate and nurturing, loves to help others and express creativity through music and cooking.
participant_2.background: I'm a vet student, so I can help animals and use my math and science skills in a career that I love. I would find another way to express my creativity. I am a student living at home while pursuing my music industry degree. I am a chef. I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.

content.text: What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to play music and cook.
Me too! What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and piano. I also sing.
That's awesome! I play the guitar too.
Cool! What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different types of music, but my favorite is probably classic rock.
Me too! I love classic rock.
What's your favorite song?
I have a lot of favorite songs, but one of my favorites is Bohemian Rhapsody by Queen.
That's a great song! I love it too.
What's your favorite type of food to cook?
I like to cook a lot of different types of food, but my favorite is probably Italian food.
Me too! I love Italian food.
What's your favorite Italian dish to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes.
Me too! I love making pasta.
Do you like to make homemade pasta?
I've never made homemade pasta before, but I've always wanted to try it.
It's not that hard to make. You can find a lot of good recipes online.
I'll have to try it sometime.
You should! It's really fun to make.
I'm sure it is.
I'm glad we have something in common. We should cook together sometime.
That would be fun
